abstract: The verification that the boost mode portion of the flight program correctly provides navigation and guidance functions for the vehicle during periods when significant, measurable accelerations exist was described. Many test cases and performance cases are made, testing the ability of the navigation and guidance routines to properly compensate for several perturbations. Various plots of special interest parameters are made on all performance cases, facilitating a check on each calculation (each boost major loop) of these parameters.
title: Boost navigation and guidance

publications.publicationName: Program Verification Doc. for the ASTP Flight Program

related.title: Program verification document for the ASTP flight program
